name: Project Cheerbot
description:
[The game is in French for now, English will come later!]

As a remote-controlled robot, you must match a ouendan cheer master's movements!

Join Miki and her trusty Cheerbot as they must prepare for the Comfort Tour!
Follow the instructions of cheer master Raida Inoue as he guides you through his super interactive instructive VHS tape. You have 40 seconds to perform 30 motions.

But be warned, Cheerbot is very delicate: one false move and it's over!

------

HOW TO PLAY:

Press the arrow key that matches what is displayed on the TV

Left punch (HIDARI!)
Left arrow key

Right punch (MIGI!)
Right arrow key

Arms raised (OSU!)
Up arrow key

Downwards chop (SORE!)
Down arrow key

------

KNOWN ISSUES:
-Fonts because oversight
-Pressing two keys on the same frame (correct and incorrect) triggers a spazzing out of the TV, unfortunately dubbed Super Cheer Mode. >_>
Should this happen, simply reset the game as I do not know yet how to fix this issue. Thanks Javascript ;~;
